name: Heartpiercer

actions.name: Pierce The Heart
actions.detail: Your next attack with this weapon allows you to lunge two spaces towards your attack target (ignoring reactions) and adds +2 Knockback. If the target collides with a wall, object, or character, the target must pass a hull save or take 1d6 kinetic damage and become prone.

description: Secondary thrusters and experimental chemical catalysts allow pilots to leverage forward momentum with their weapon attacks into a devastating charge. Pilots of Afenatene-pattern Akrafena are cleared to use this mod, as it exposes the pilot to great risk of counter-attack.

name: Splendor Mod
effect: Attacks with this weapon count as AoEs for the purposes of resistance/vulnerability to AoEs (e.g. The Drake and Squads).

actions.name: Mark of Splendor
actions.detail: On hit you may mark an enemy with the Mark of Splendor. Only one mark may be active at a time.

actions.name: Splendid Blaze
actions.detail: Detonate the Mark of Splendor to deal 1d3 Explosive damage to the Marked character and all characters within Burst 2 of them.

actions.name: Laser Guided Course Correction
actions.trigger: You miss your initial attack target.
actions.detail: You may reroll the attack against one enemy within Range 5 of the original target.

name: Impact Mod
effect: On a Critical Hit, enemies hit by the weapon this mod is attached to must make a Hull Save or become Immobilized.
